job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Human Resources
job.description: POZENT is searching for <strong>Machine Learning Engineer</strong> to work remotely.<br><br>Location: New Jersey<br><br>Onsite Flexibility: 100% Remote<br><br><strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong><strong>Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>- B.S or higher in Computer Science or similar (Engineering, Math, Physics) or equivalent software development experience</li><li>- A strong quantitative background (Probability Theory, Statistics, Linear Algebra, etc.)- Experience in data curation/cleansing, model evaluation, feature engineering, and dimensionality reduction</li><li>- 10 years of relevant industry experience</li><li>- Proven ability to develop, deploy, and maintain machine learning models in a production environment</li><li>- Experienced in writing high-quality pipeline and notebook code</li><li>- Fluent in Python and modern Client libraries like Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, Keras/Tensorflow</li><li>- Experienced in NLP models</li><li>- Familiarity with modern computational tools &amp; infrastructure like AWS/GCP, Docker, Git</li><li>- Experience with distributed only systems and RESTful architectures</li><li>- Adept in ambiguous situations, flexible and comfortable making decisions using minimal available data</li><li>- Comfortable working independently with minimal supervision<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> Graph Neural Networks<br></li></ul>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>uVcckdpS1T
